Name: sosa:Observation
Definition: Act of carrying out an observation, linking Sensor, Property, FeatureOfInterest, and Result.

Name: sosa:Sensor
Definition: Device, agent, or system that performs observations.

Name: sosa:FeatureOfInterest
Definition: Entity whose property is observed or acted upon.

Name: sosa:ObservableProperty
Definition: Property of a FeatureOfInterest that can be observed.

Name: sosa:Result
Definition: Result of an Observation, Actuation, or Sampling.

Name: sosa:Procedure
Definition: Method, algorithm, or workflow for an Observation, Actuation, or Sampling.

Name: sosa:Actuation
Definition: Act of applying a change to a FeatureOfInterest.

Name: sosa:Actuator
Definition: Device, agent, or system that performs Actuation.

Name: sosa:Sample
Definition: Subset or extract of a FeatureOfInterest intended for observation or analysis.

Name: sosa:Sampler
Definition: Device, agent, or process that creates or selects Samples.

Name: sosa:hasFeatureOfInterest
Definition: Links Observation to the FeatureOfInterest.

Name: sosa:observedProperty
Definition: Links Observation to the ObservableProperty.

Name: sosa:madeBySensor
Definition: Links Observation to the Sensor that made it.

Name: sosa:hasResult
Definition: Links Observation to the Result.

Name: sosa:resultTime
Definition: Time when the Observation result was generated.

Name: sosa:phenomenonTime
Definition: Time when the observed phenomenon occurred.

Name: sosa:usedProcedure
Definition: Procedure used in an Observation, Actuation, or Sampling.

Name: sosa:isResultOf
Definition: Inverse relation: Result â†’ Observation/Actuation/Sampling.

Name: sosa:hasSample
Definition: Links a FeatureOfInterest to its Sample.

Name: sosa:isSampleOf
Definition: Links a Sample to its FeatureOfInterest.
